title: [SOLVED]Macbook Air 13 (820-00165) shitty logic board again Why WHY
message: Now board was water damaged around U3220 ,cleaned ,replaced now when connect board with charger green light and orange but no spin PPBUS_G3H 8.5  V,PPVRTC  3.3V ,PP5V_S5 5V missing PP5V_S4RS3  ,now when I connect battery and charger macbook chime and start (working) once when started I can disconnect battery and its still will work ,so to turn on needs battery connected ?????

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Air 13 (820-00165) shitty logic board again Why WHY
message: Lol I literally had the same problem last week! If it recognizes, charges, and runs off of the battery, I'd leave it.

message: I only notice without battery that C7126 CHGR_BGATE  voltage is fluctuating from 8.5V and 1.2V  ,with battery is stable 8.5V

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Air 13 (820-00165) shitty logic board again Why WHY
message: Resistance betwenn pins 17-18 and 27-28 from isl6259?? Voltage on pin 2?? Only charger...

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Air 13 (820-00165) shitty logic board again Why WHY
message: Resistance between 27-28 is 21omh and 17-18 is 4omh and voltage on pin 2 is 19.6v using 85w magsafe

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Air 13 (820-00165) shitty logic board again Why WHY
message: Did you check PP3V42_G3H in both cases? Maybe something wrong with D7005 and/or resistors close by.
